    • addToCart

      public UserDto addToCart(@NotNull @NotNull UserDto userDto, RestaurantfoodDto restaurantfoodDto) throws Exception
      Add a food menu to a certain user
      Parameters:
      userDto - the user that added the food to its cart
      restaurantfoodDto - the food that needs to be added
      Returns:
      a new user with the cart updated
      Throws:
      Exception - if the user or food doesn't exist or something is incomplete

      Create a new order for a certain user with information
      Parameters:
      userDto - the user that needs to be addressed
      restaurantfoodDtos - the food that is currently in the client's cart

      Returns:
      a new user with the update information
      Throws:
      Exception - if something is wrong, then an exception is thrown
